message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I believe it would be highly valuable to you.  I'm starting the price at $15,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Can you consider that?
Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your perspective, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $13,500?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can we try $11,500?
Bob, I'm trying to be flexible, but I need to be fair to myself as well. $12,500 is my final offer.
I understand you're trying to be fair, but I'm really close to my budget. Can we meet at $12,000?
